Hello, I'm Irene
Nice to meet you

LET ME
INTRODUCE MYSELF

I’m Irene Marcuello Gallardo an artist settled in Barcelona. I specialize myself in graphic design and UI.

I’m a design graduate with mention in visual creation in EINA, Barcelona. This background gave a stong toolset of visual development which allowed me to merge my knowledge with my passion, videogames. Since then I’m keen on following my dream.

I’ve completed a master in Art and animation for AAA videogames in the UPC (Universitat Politènica de Catalunya) and put myself through some projects and experiences to test myself.

Right now I’m looking somewhere to work. If you liked my projects, please feel free to download my CV to get more detail information.

F1ND-R

A lot of people on the universe lost their items and go to the Lost Dimension where F1ND-R will have to collect and deliver all the items in time to their clients. A videogame developed in the Global game jam 2021 under the theme of Lost and found.

KNOW MORE

TWINLIGHT SOULS

Save the forest of Niberry fighting the darkness and bring back life! A cooperative hack n slash that will transport you to the magical adventures. A videogame developed as a final project of the master's degree in AAA videogames at the UPC

KNOW MORE
